SEARCH
Package com.group7.krisefikser.service

Class HouseholdService

java.lang.Object
com.group7.krisefikser.service.HouseholdService
@Service public class HouseholdService extends Object
Service class for managing household-related operations. Provides methods for creating households, handling join requests, and managing household memberships.

  • Method Details

    • createHouseholdForUser

      public Long createHouseholdForUser(String userName)
      Creates a household for the user with a unique name. The household name is generated based on the user's name and a UUID. If a household with the same name already exists, it appends a counter to the name.
      Parameters:
      userName - The name of the user for whom the household is being created.
      Returns:
      The ID of the created household.

    • createHousehold

      @Transactional public Household createHousehold(Household household, Long userId)
      Creates a new household and associates it with a user.
      Parameters:
      household - the Household object containing household details
      userId - the ID of the user creating the household
      Returns:
      the created Household object with the generated ID

    • requestToJoin

      @Transactional public JoinHouseholdRequest requestToJoin(Long householdId, Long userId)
      Creates a request for a user to join a household.
      Parameters:
      householdId - the ID of the household to join
      userId - the ID of the user making the request
      Returns:
      the saved JoinHouseholdRequest object

    • acceptJoinRequest

      @Transactional public void acceptJoinRequest(Long requestId)
      Accepts a join request and updates the user's household association.
      Parameters:
      requestId - the ID of the join request to accept

    • declineJoinRequest

      @Transactional public void declineJoinRequest(Long requestId)
      Declines a join request by deleting it.
      Parameters:
      requestId - the ID of the join request to decline

    • getRequestsForHousehold

      public List<JoinHouseholdRequest> getRequestsForHousehold(Long householdId)
      Retrieves all join requests for a specific household.
      Parameters:
      householdId - the ID of the household
      Returns:
      a list of JoinHouseholdRequest objects associated with the household
